alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 08 at 3:04AM CST until February 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River near Tahlequah affecting Cherokee County. Illinois River near Watts affecting Adair and Delaware Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River near Watts. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, minor flooding occurs from the Arkansas border to near Fidler`s Bend. Extreme turbulence makes the river unsafe for floating. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
